definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: When the aura of birth or plan to dismantle suture cesarean section.
sentences.chinese: 当出现了临产先兆或计划施行剖宫产时再拆除缝线。

sentences.english: Tension must be correct and must not pucker.
sentences.chinese: 缝线张力必须正确，不能起皱。

sentences.english: In the control group, the sutures passed around the coronary artery but were not tied.
sentences.chinese: 在对照组，缝线绕过大鼠的冠状动脉但不结扎。

sentences.english: Sutures are foreign bodies but a necessary adjunct in surgery .
sentences.chinese: 缝线是一种异物，但是一种在手术中必要的附属品。

sentences.english: Gather To draw up fabric fullness on a line of stitching.
sentences.chinese: 将面料按缝线抽紧，形成一种丰满的效果。

sentences.english: Then tack all the patterns onto the cambric cloth with sewing thread.
sentences.chinese: 将所有的花样都用缝线固定在胚布上。

sentences.english: Then we find the edge of the tear and close it up with sutures.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们找到撕裂的边缘，用缝线缝合。

sentences.english: Possibility to reinforce inner or outer surfaces with stainless steel threads.
sentences.chinese: 内外表面之间可用不锈钢丝车缝线进行缝合加强。

sentences.english: This melds the seams, causing the thread to sink nicely into the fabric.
sentences.chinese: 这样熨平缝线，使得线紧贴在面料上。

sentences.english: Fold the side seam under and cut out the armhole.
sentences.chinese: 折叠侧缝线并剪下袖窿。

sentences.english: Mary jane has a water-resistant, suede upper with contrast stitching.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽珍有一个防水麂皮鞋面与对比缝线。

sentences.english: Inside, the cabin boasts black leather upholstery, yellow contrast stitching and embroidered headrests.
sentences.chinese: 车内配备黑色真皮内饰，黄色缝线及绣花头枕。

sentences.english: Animal model of IOL ciliary sulcus suture fixation was established with whois.
sentences.chinese: 以家兔建立人工晶体睫状沟缝线固定术动物模型。

sentences.english: To prevent a seam from stretching, sue a twill tape to support the seam.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止缝线伸长，用斜纹布贴带加以固定。

sentences.english: Be careful not to snip loose strings too close to the stitches of an applique.
sentences.chinese: 要小心，不要剪断松弦太接近缝线的贴花。

sentences.english: Each attachment site is capable of slidably receiving a respective suture thereon.
sentences.chinese: 每个附连位点能够可滑动地在其上接纳各根缝线。

definition: dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)
to sew together/suture (in surgery)/to sew up (a wound)
